analysis.key_quote: Honestly, it seems like the time it will take to make the appointments, the massive turnover, and the retraining alone would be incredibly INEFFICIENT and a complete waste of time and resources, not to mention that politicizing these roles will drastically erode the quality and integrity of the work being done.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the politicization of public services and its negative impact on efficiency and integrity, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
